explains: n. 恶作剧，开玩笑；戏谑
wordGroup: play pranks ◎戏弄，开玩笑 , ◎(机器等)出毛病，运转反常

sentences.en: The prank crammed his mailbox with computer-delivered electronic junk mail.
sentences.cn: 该恶作剧病毒把他的邮箱塞满计算机发送的电子垃圾邮件。

sentences.en: Removing the boxes will reduce the number of prank calls without hampering people's ability to report a fire.
sentences.cn: 移除盒子将减少恶作剧电话的数量，同时也不会对人们报告火灾的能力造成影响。

sentences.en: The vast majority of false fire alarms are prank calls made anonymously from fire alarm boxes on street corners.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数火灾误报都是用街角的消防报警箱匿名拨打的恶作剧电话。
